donations.donation_comment: The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.
Sending love and prayers from the U.S. as you change the world and ignite hope for so many. Thank you for your example of love and unity, and for standing strong for freedom! Keep it up!

O Canada!
Our home and native land!
True patriot love in all of us command.

With glowing hearts we see thee rise,
The True North strong and free!

From far and wide,
O Canada, we stand on guard for thee.

God keep our land glorious and free!
O Canada, we stand on guard for thee.

O Canada, we stand on guard for thee.

KEEP FIGHTING FOR FREEDOM BOTH THE FREEDOM CONVOY AND THIS WEBSITE ROCK!

Hold the line Patriots! We love you. We are behind you. Thank you for being brave and leading this movement of peaceful non-compliance. You are making history...changing history...and we will be forever grateful.

This tyranny needs to end now, and the people responsible need to face justice. What has happened over the last two years is an absolute disgrace, a moral and ethical outrage. I'll support anyone willing to stand against it. God bless Canadians, and anyone else in the world willing to oppose communist state oppression.
Keep up the good work truckers.
Freedoms just another name for nothing left to lose.

Thanks and blessings truckers and all those with you and supporting you! Your courage in defending freedom in a peaceful manner is exemplary. May more stand up oppose those trying to take our freedoms away. May this movement spread worldwide!
